weaponpacka:blockdesc-toolmold-*-club: Used to make a cheap 1/2 metal cost club
weaponpacka:itemdesc-enlongblade-*: A large metal sword with average damage, durability, range, and speed. Standard armor penetration
weaponpacka:itemdesc-gladius-*: A long bronze sword with average damage, durability, range, and speed. It's light build leave it with poor armor penetration
weaponpacka:itemdesc-haleberd-*: A very slow but insanely high damage polearm, has high durability but lower range for a polearm. Good against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-polespear-*: A long-reaching, average damage polearm. Has a slow swing speed and slightly below average durability. Good against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-igorotaxe-*: A particularly brutal type of war axe with a very sharp point. Deals exceedingly high damage at an average speed, but has a very poor durability. Good against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-katar-*: A push dagger capable of extremely rapid but very low damage attacks. The short blade gives it insanely high durability but quite low range. Good against armor
itemcraftdesc-katar-*: A very fast push dagger which has very high durability but low damage
weaponpacka:itemdesc-khopesh-*: A casted sword-axe hybrid capable of above average damage at a slow speed. Has a somewhat poor durability. Standard armor penetration
weaponpacka:itemdesc-machete-*: Less of a weapon and more of a tool; this knife can harvest grass, carcasses, and rip through all plant matter with ease. Has a very high durability, but is unsuitable for crafting
weaponpacka:itemdesc-macu-*: A club with a set of sharp stone teeth. It deals a very high damage at an average speed, but it also has very low durability. Standard armor penetration
weaponpacka:itemdesc-naginata-*: An average speed polearm with above average durability, but it deals slightly below average damage and has a lower range for a polearm. Poor against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-rapier-*: A thin, long sword capable of delivering extremely quick piercing attacks that deal a low amount of damage with a below average durability. Great against armor
itemcraftdesc-rapier-*: A very light and fast sword that has good reach but lower damage and durability
weaponpacka:itemdesc-spikedagger-*: A small dagger shaped like a spike. Despite is low damage, speed, and durability; all of it's damage completely ignores armor
itemcraftdesc-spikedagger-*: A fragile low damage and speed dagger that completely ignores armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-tachi-*: A curved sword with below average damage but a quick swing speed and a high amount of durability. Poor against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-throwingspear-*: A single-use throwing weapon. While not an efficient way to use resources, the damage these little spears do when thrown is nothing to scoff at and they travel super fast. Can be used less effectively as a melee weapon
weaponpacka:itemdesc-waraxe-*: A slow but very high damage war axe with poor durability. Standard armor penetration
weaponpacka:itemdesc-warhammer-*: A very slow war hammer capable of above average damage. It's solid head gives it high durability. Good against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-warpick-*: A war pick with a standard swing speed, very high durability, but slightly below average damage. Great against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-epsilonaxe-*: A slow but very high damage war axe with poor durability. Standard armor penetration
weaponpacka:itemdesc-mambele-*: A hybrid melee-throwing weapon. Has a slow but powerful melee attack and gains a slight damage bonus when thrown. It's disposable design leaves it with low durability. Poor against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-trident-*: A trident with a set of carved bone forks, while very slow and not suitable for throwing, it offers superior reach and durability without sacrificing too much damage
weaponpacka:itemdesc-metalclub-*: Essentially a stick with a lump of lead on the end. While extremely durable it is slow to swing. Good against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-culacula-*: A wooden war paddle carved from hardwood, it's light weight allows it to strike quickly but not very hard. Poor against armor
weaponpacka:itemdesc-clubhead-*: Only takes half a lead ingot of metal to cast
weaponpacka:itemdesc-harvestknifehead-*: Created via casting, can also be made on an anvil
itemcraftdesc-harvestknifehead-*: Used to make a knife that can harvest animals and tear through plant matter
itemcraftdesc-mambelehead-*: For making a pair of cheap but reusable throwing daggers
weaponpacka:itemdesc-club-*: Most problems in life can be solved with a club. Slow but effective
itemcraftdesc-chakri-*: Single use sharp throwing rings, you get more per ingot compared to javelins but they deal a bit less damage
weaponpacka:itemdesc-chakri-*: A single-use throwing weapon. More cost efficient than javelins but they deal less damage. Can be used less effectively as a melee weapon
itemcraftdesc-haleberdhead-*: Used to make a high damage but slow polearm
itemcraftdesc-throwingspearhead-*: Used to make extremely high damage but single use javelins
itemcraftdesc-bastardswordhead-*: Used to make a well rounded sword
itemcraftdesc-epsilonaxehead-*: Used to make a high damage but slow war axe
itemcraftdesc-igorothead-*: Used to make an extremely high damage but fragile axe
itemcraftdesc-naginatahead-*: Used to make a quick striking polearm that deals slightly less damage but has good durability
itemcraftdesc-spontoonhead-*: For building a long range polearm which deals standard damage but is slightly less durable
itemcraftdesc-spathahead-*: Used to make a well rounded bronze age sword
weaponpacka:itemdesc-tachihead-*: Created via casting, can also be made on an anvil
itemcraftdesc-tachihead-*: Used to make a quick striking but low damage sword
itemcraftdesc-waraxehead-*: Used to make a high damage but slow war axe
itemcraftdesc-warhammerhead-*: Used to make a durable, moderate damage war hammer that is quite slow
itemcraftdesc-warpickhead-*: Used to make a very durable, slightly lower damage war pick with an average attack speed
